excursions.title: Medina Tour
excursions.description: Explore the iconic monuments and palaces for an immersive journey through the history of Marrakech. Wander through winding alleys to uncover hidden treasures.

excursions.title: Ourika Valley
excursions.description: Admire spectacular landscapes of the High Atlas Mountains and the Ourika River. Explore preserved Berber villages and discover the seven waterfalls of Setti Fatma.

excursions.title: The Berber Trails
excursions.description: Hike through the peaks of the High Atlas and the Three Valleys. Discover ancient Berber villages and enjoy traditional lunch in picturesque valleys.

excursions.title: Ouzoud Waterfalls
excursions.description: Visit the most beautiful waterfalls in North Africa, standing 110 meters high with permanent rainbows. Watch Rhesus macaques and enjoy lunch with stunning views.

excursions.title: Essaouira
excursions.description: Discover the charming coastal city beloved by surfers. Enjoy sunsets over Mogador Island, explore the souks, and experience the unique Atlantic climate.

excursions.title: Quad Biking in Agafay Desert
excursions.description: Ride across diverse desert landscapes on an exhilarating quad adventure. Meet Berber culture and enjoy mint tea with locals for authentic immersion.
excursions.priceTag: 450 MAD per driver / 300 MAD per passenger

excursions.title: Hot Air Balloon Flight
excursions.description: Breathtaking panoramic views: Enjoy stunning aerial views of Marrakech and the Atlas Mountains on this unforgettable hot air balloon ride. A peaceful and memorable experience: Soar gently for a one-hour flight, creating lasting memories before a smooth landing and a celebratory moment to mark the adventure.

excursions.title: Road of the Kasbahs
excursions.description: Take the spectacular Tizi n'Tichka pass, visit Berber villages, and discover the legendary Road of Kasbahs - a natural film set for famous movies.

excursions.title: Complete Marrakech Tour
excursions.description: Comprehensive tour covering all major attractions of Marrakech including palaces, gardens, souks, and hidden gems with expert local guide.

excursions.title: Buggy Adventure in Agafay Desert
excursions.description: Explore this peaceful haven just 30 km from Marrakech, discover diverse landscapes, and meet the Berbers during a mint tea break. Accompanied by experienced guides for a secure and unforgettable experience.

excursions.title: Imlil & Asni
excursions.description: Visit Imlil, a charming mountain village and gateway to Mount Toubkal, the highest peak in North Africa. Explore Toubkal National Park with its rich diversity of landscapes, from high plateaus to deep gorges.

excursions.title: Dromedary Ride in Agafay Desert
excursions.description: Discover the Agafay Desert on a relaxing ride through stone desert landscapes and palm groves. Pass through traditional villages and end with mint tea in a traditional nomadic tent.

excursions.title: Fantasia Dinner at Chez Ali
excursions.description: Traditional Moroccan dinner show set in a magical setting on the outskirts of Marrakech. Features music, fantasia, and folkloric dances - a unique experience combining gastronomy and culture under the stars.

excursions.title: Moroccan Cooking Class
excursions.description: Immerse yourself in Moroccan gastronomy. Prepare your own dish under expert guidance of a professional chef. Enjoy the fruits of your labor with an authentic and rewarding culinary moment.

excursions.title: Belectric Scooter Ride
excursions.description: Explore Marrakech in a unique way with our all-terrain electric scooters, from the lively medina to the serene palm grove. Enjoy a fun, immersive, and eco-friendly experience, guided by a passionate local expert.

excursions.title: Lgardens & Ramparts by Carriage
excursions.description: Enjoy an authentic open-air experience in a horse-drawn carriage. Discover Majorelle Garden, stroll through Menara Gardens, and admire the majestic ramparts and monumental gates of the Red City.

excursions.title: Lights of Marrakech & BBQ Dinner
excursions.description: Discover Marrakech at sunset with an elegant horse-drawn carriage ride through illuminated fountains, historic ramparts, and Jemaa El Fna square. Followed by a traditional barbecue dinner in an authentic riad.

excursions.title: Marrakech by Night
excursions.description: Discover the magic of Marrakech by night on a romantic carriage ride. Admire illuminated fountains, the prestigious La Mamounia Casino, ancient city walls, and end near the iconic Jemaa El Fna square.

excursions.title: Evening in the Marrakech Desert
excursions.description: Embark on a true desert adventure in Agafay with a unique safari combining thrill and wonder. Cross arid landscapes in a 4x4, then experience an unforgettable sunset camel ride.
